565830.name: Broken Sword 5: Soundtrack
565830.description:
The stunning soundtrack for Broken Sword 5 - the Serpent’s Curse, featuring music from world-acclaimed composer, Barrington Pheloung.

Track List
  • 01 - Opening Theme
  • 02 - Sneaking Around
  • 03 - Nico's Heaven
  • 04 - London Overture
  • 05 - Ominous Signs
  • 06 - Someone is Coming
  • 07 - By the Seine
  • 08 - The Widow
  • 09 - La Maledicció
  • 10 - The Escape
  • 11 - Arriving in Catalonia
  • 12 - A Secret Passage
  • 13 - The Cathars' Hidden Trail
  • 14 - Langham's Theme
  • 15 - A Chapel in the Mountains
  • 16 - Gehnen's Tomb
  • 17 - The Tabula's Secret
  • 18 - Foreboding Eden
  • 19 - Eden Destroyed
  • 20 - Pause for Reflection (Menu Theme)
  • 21 - Credits Theme
  • 22 - Jasmine
565830.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语*, 意大利语*, 德语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙*, 波兰语, 俄语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
